name: MagesQuest (Beta)
description:
INFO:

This is the very first version of a game that I am currently making. The final build will be uploaded soon with better physics and features. The game WILL be buggy and have glitches, but thats expected from the first build. Also the level design will be HEAVILY overdone. The newer build will come sometime soon.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys to move and jump (you have a double jump if you double press up)

Space to shoot fire to kill snakes when you grab a torch (the fire counter is in the top right)

LORE:

You are a mage who is trapped in an underground maze and need to escape. Grab the key in each level to progress through the door! The key may only appear when all the coins are collected or if you kill the right enemy.
